lexUnit.name: within.prep
lexUnit.definition: COD: not further off than (a particular distance).

sentence.text: The Tintern Forest , the Wye Valley Walk , and Offa 's Dyke are all within 2 miles and there are over thirty waymarked walks within 5 miles of the Crown .
